metadata.title: CVE-2022-1437 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to5.7.0. The bug causes the program reads data past the end of the intentedbuffer. Typically, this can allow attackers to read sensitive informationfrom other memory locations or cause a crash.

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
